ENGLISH: Your forces have entered the region of [From.GetName] and found a host of Ents dwelling there.
Your forces have entered the region of [From.GetName] and found a number of spider's webs about.
Excellent, the Tree herders will make excellent allies.
Root them out, one and all.
They are a blight and must be purged.
They'll make an excellent detterent to our enemies.
You are informed that the the purge of the Ents has gone well, no more can be found in [Root.GetName].
You are informed that the the purge of the Spiders has gone well, no more can be found in [Root.GetName].
